tool.name: CreateWeightedOverlayMosaic

param.name: in_workspace
param.dialogReference: The file geodatabase that will store the mosaic dataset.
param.pythonReference: The file geodatabase that will store the mosaic dataset.

tool.summary:
Creates a new mosaic dataset for suitability modeling in GeoPlanner and Web AppBuilder. The mosaic will contain all raster layers (.tif only) in the ArcGIS Pro Contents Pane. Symbology information is read from each layer and written to fields within the mosaic.

After running this tool and successfully creating a new mosaic dataset, you can share this as an image layer to ArcGIS Enterprise and Image Server. Consider refining the mosaic dataset layers by running the Update WRO Layer Classification and Update WRO Layer Info tools before sharing to Enterprise.
tool.usage:
• The tool examines each layer in the contents pane. If the layer is a raster .tif, it will attempt to add the layer to the mosaic.

  • If a layer is configured with a classify or unique value renderer, those values will be written to the mosaic dataset's inputRanges, outputValues, and RangeLabels fields.

  • If a layer is configured with a stretch renderer, the tool will compute an equal interval classification and write those values to the mosaic dataset's inputRanges, outputValues, and RangeLabels fields.
